description:
Oct 31-Nov 2: Banff Trail to Sunnyside (Single Tracking)

The northbound track will be closed at Lions Park, SAIT/AUArts/Jubilee, and Sunnyside stations for construction work starting at 8:30 p.m. on Friday, October 31 until the early hours of Monday, November 3.

This means the trains will only be using one track at these stations for travel in both directions. Whether you¿re heading northbound towards Tuscany, or southbound towards City Centre/Somerset-Bridlewood, you will need to catch the train via the southbound side of the platform (the one heading toward City Centre).

For more information please visit calgarytransit.com/ctrain-service
